90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Neil,
Thank you for scheduling a call with me today at one. I let Brendan know that I would be reach out to you  I apologize for any confusion.
Looking forward to speaking with you.
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Midkiff, Neil [USA] [mailto:midkiff_neil@bah.com] Sent: Friday, January 27, 2012 6:04 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Sara: Will do. I got a email from Brenda Dillon earlier for Booz Allen. G. Neil Midkiff Booz Allen Hamilton 703 602 4286 office 703 943 7452 mobile
From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Friday, January 27, 2012 05:58 PM To: Midkiff, Neil [USA] Subject: MBO Partners
Dear Neil ,
Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Tad McCall. Tad has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
